PERSONA:
meet john, a 68-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. he is a highly educated individual, having completed postgraduate studies and holding a college degree or higher.

john is married and follows a religion other than christianity, attending religious services once a week. politically, he aligns himself with the democratic party and considers himself to be very liberal in his ideological views.

financially, john is well-off, with a family income of $100,000 or more, placing him in the upper-income tier. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain that he is registered at his current address.

in his daily life, john is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not currently engage in any volunteer work.

overall, john is a well-educated, financially secure, and politically engaged individual who values his religious beliefs and stays connected through frequent internet use.
